title: Beachfront New South Wales Self-Contained Apartments with Late Checkout
description: Land yourself in a coastal paradise with a self-contained apartment stay at Abode Malua Bay. Overlooking lush hinterlands, and just metres from the shoreline, breathe in the fresh sea breeze as you scan one of New South Wales' most impressive coastlines. Enjoy unrivalled access to the beach and explore the untouched beauty of the region with a nature walk from your doorstep. You'll feel right at home among modern and comfortable finishes and uber-friendly service.
offer_address: 4 Kuppa Avenue, Malua Bay NSW 2536, Australia
